subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: After stopping Federer’s momentum in four sets in this year’s Wimbledon final, Djokovic did the same, earning a second U.S. Open singles title and a 10th Grand Slam singles title.
snippet: After stopping Federer’s momentum in four sets in this year’s Wimbledon final, Djokovic did the same, earning a second U.S. Open singles title and a 10th Grand Slam singles title.
